member.name: IDragSourceHelper.InitializeFromBitmap
member.summary: Initializes the drag-image manager for a windowless control.
member.param: The structure that contains information about the bitmap.
A pointer to the data object's interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDragSourceHelper.InitializeFromWindow
member.summary: Initializes the drag-image manager for a control with a window.
member.param: A handle to the window that receives the DI_GETDRAGIMAGE message. This value can be NULL.

A pointer to a structure that specifies the location of the cursor within the drag image. The structure should contain the offset from the upper-left corner of the drag image to the location of the cursor. This value can be NULL.
A pointer to the data object's interface.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IDragSourceHelper
member.summary: Exposed by the Shell to allow an application to specify the image that will be displayed during a Shell drag-and-drop operation.
